description: Modifies the definition of an existing DataBrew schedule.

parameters.name: JobNames
parameters.description: The name or names of one or more jobs to be run for this schedule. (string) ---

parameters.name: CronExpression
parameters.description: The date or dates and time or times when the jobs are to be run. For more information, see Cron expressions in the Glue DataBrew Developer Guide.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the schedule to update.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the schedule that was updated.
